segments.text: You won't believe what just happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went down to change some money , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We need some . How much did you change ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wanted to change around 5000 dollars . And you know the exchange rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's about 35 pesos for every Taiwan dollar , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went into the bank with my money , and I looked at the exchange board.At first I couldn't believe it . I thought I was reading the board wrong or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because the board said 60 pesos for every Taiwan dollar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sixty ? That's too much . How can that be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought it was wrong too . It didn't make sense .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just two days ago it was 35 . How can it be 60 ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , I went up to the teller and started to exchange the money . And it's true.They really gave me sixty pesos for the dollar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's amazing ! Really ? How could it change so much in two days ?
segments.speaker: S2
